Class AbsoluteLayout

java.lang.Object
org.netbeans.lib.awtextra.AbsoluteLayout
All Implemented Interfaces:
LayoutManager, LayoutManager2, Serializable
public class AbsoluteLayout extends Object implements LayoutManager2, Serializable
Minimal AbsoluteLayout implementation to avoid requiring the external NetBeans AbsoluteLayout library at compile/javadoc time. This layout places components at fixed x/y coordinates. If width/height is -1, the component's preferred size is used.
See Also:
